#summary OOPS possible evolutions and roadmap

=Future Proof: HTML5=

The whole project is born with the ultimate goal to be future-proof i.e. designed to follow future technologies, in particular HTML5 online/offline support has been considered, with the transition made possible by Gears.

=Next release=

Data has not been set yet for the next release which should include:

    * Better download of annexes and diagrams
    * Speed improvements
    * UI improvements (online notification, ...)
    * Advanced online/offline search
 
=Foreseen developments=

Main foreseen developments are related to the:

    * deployment of online/offlne systems with backoffices other than Plone.
    * offline capture of data / updates (comments, forms, etc.)
    * offline consumption on mobile and handheld devices

See also: TechRoadmap
